Text.Page:
Eurgh! How is it you're not retching? Doesn't the stench sear your nostrils?

Our quartermaster promised us an entire crate of fragrant rosehips, but he fled to the Twisted Vale. If you could recover some, even just a small amount would be a great help.
(The crate lies splintered. A few petals of rosehips remain. You should take it back to Bolga.)

Is that all you found? You're not holding out on me, are you? It's not funny. This stench colors my dreams!

Well, if this is all you have, it will have to do!
